sourcesContent:
Login or Create an Account

OTP: {{otp}}

Your personal data will be used to support your experience throughout this website, to manage access to your account, and for other purposes described in our privacy policy.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent { otp:any=''; generateOTP() { this.otp = Math.floor((Math.random() * 1000000) + 1); } }
